TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit RangeValuePattern/RangeValuePatternInformation extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Proporciona acceso a los valores de propiedades de un objeto mediante sus descriptores de acceso o .

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

related.span: Información general acerca de los patrones de control de UI Automation

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene un valor que especifica si el valor de un elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] es de solo lectura.

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.

value.span: si el valor es de solo lectura; si se puede modificar.

span.span: if the value is read-only; if it can be modified.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Un control debe tener su establecido en `true` y su establecido en `false` antes de la creación de un objeto.A control should have its set to `true` and its set to `false` prior to the creation of a object. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un que admita la patrón de control tiene su valor aumenta o disminuye por específico del control valor.In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103largechange)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103largechange)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LargeChange As Double
public: property double LargeChange { double get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene el valor de cambio grande específico del control que se suma a la propiedad o se resta de ella.

span.span: Gets the control-specific large-change value which is added to or subtracted from the property.

value.span: Valor de cambio grande o si el elemento no admite .

span.span: The large-change value or if the element does not support .
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un que admita la patrón de control tiene su valor aumenta o disminuye por específico del control valor.In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103largechange)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103largechange)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Maximum As Double
public: property double Maximum { double get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene el valor máximo del intervalo que el elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] admite.

span.span: Gets the maximum range value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

value.span: El valor máximo admitido por el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento o si no es compatible con el elemento .

span.span: The maximum value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or if the element does not support .
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un que admita la patrón de control tiene su valor establecido en el valor máximo específico del control.In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value set to the control-specific maximum value. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#104Maximum](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#104maximum)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#104Maximum](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#104maximum)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#104)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#101)]

summary.span: Obtiene el valor mínimo del intervalo que el elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] admite.

span.span: Gets the minimum range value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

value.span: El valor mínimo admitido por el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento o si no es compatible con el elemento .

span.span: The minimum value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or if the element does not support .
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un que admita la patrón de control tiene su valor establecido en el valor mínimo específica del control.In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value set to the control-specific minimum value. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SmallChange As Double
public: property double SmallChange { double get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene el valor de cambio pequeño, único para el elemento de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], que se suma a la propiedad de los elementos o se resta de ella.

span.span: Gets the small-change value, unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element, which is added to or subtracted from the elements property.

value.span: El valor de cambio pequeño único para el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento o si no es compatible con el elemento .

span.span: The small-change value unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or if the element does not support .
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un que admita la patrón de control tiene su valor aumenta o disminuye por específico del control valor.In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103SmallChange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103smallchange)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103SmallChange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103smallchange)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As Double
public: property double Value { double get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene el valor actual del elemento de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

span.span: Gets the current value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

value.span: El valor actual de la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento o si no es compatible con el elemento .

span.span: The current value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or if the element does not support .
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un objeto obtenido de un control de destino se pasa a una función que recupera actual los valores de propiedad.In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current property values. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#102)]
